mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN PANEL P ON (M.MNO = P.MNO) WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_TYPE != '기업' AND LEAVE_DATE IS NULL AND CERTIFICATION = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER VALUES (SEQ_MNO.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userAddress}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, '패널', NULL, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 'N', NULL)
INSERT INTO PANEL VALUES (#{mno}, #{panelBirthday}, #{panelGender}, #{referPanelCode}, #{nominee}, 12, NULL, 1)
mapper.select: SELECT MNO FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TERMSHISTORY(TERMSHISTORY_NO, MNO, TERMS_NO, TERMS_CONSENT) SELECT SEQ_TERMSHISTORY.NEXTVAL, A.* FROM(
SELECT #{mno} AS MNO, #{item.value} AS TERMS_NO, 'Y' AS TERMS_CONSENT FROM DUAL ) A
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_ADDRESS = #{userAddress}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MNO = #{mno}
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_PWD = #{userPwd}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MNO = #{mno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PANELREWARD VALUES(0, #{mno})
INSERT INTO PANELTERNARY VALUES(#{mno}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT RW.REWARDHISTORY_NO, RW.AFTERCHANGE_POINT, RW.CHANGE_REASON, RW.CHANGE_AMOUNT, RW.MNO,REWARD_CHANGEDATE,RW.SHISTORY_NO ,R.RESEARCH_NAME,PS.SURVEY_TITLE FROM REWARDHISTORY RW LEFT JOIN SURVEYHISTORY SH ON(RW.SHISTORY_NO = SH.SHISTORY_NO) LEFT JOIN PANELSURVEY PS ON(SH.SURVEY_NO = PS.SURVEY_NO) LEFT JOIN RESEARCH R ON(RW.RESEARCH_NO = R.RESEARCH_NO) WHERE RW.MNO = #{mno} AND CHANGE_AMOUNT LIKE '%' || '+' || '%' ORDER BY REWARD_CHANGEDATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REWARDHISTORY WHERE MNO = #{mno} AND CHANGE_AMOUNT LIKE '%' || '-' || '%'

SELECT * FROM REWARDHISTORY RH LEFT JOIN CASHOUTHISTORY CH ON(CH.CASHOUTHISTORY_NO = RH.CASHOUTHISTORY_NO) LEFT JOIN PANELSURVEY PS ON(RH.SURVEY_NO = PS.SURVEY_NO) WHERE RH.MNO = #{mno} AND RH.CHANGE_AMOUNT LIKE '%' || '-' || '%' ORDER BY REWARD_CHANGEDATE DESC
SELECT * FROM(SELECT * FROM REWARDHISTORY WHERE MNO =#{mno} ORDER BY REWARD_CHANGEDATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM =1
SELECT COUNT(*)*25 FROM REWARDHISTORY WHERE MNO =#{mno} AND SURVEY_NO IS NOT NULL
SELECT NVL(SUM(CASHOUT_NO) * 10000, 0) FROM CASHOUTHISTORY WHERE CASHOUTHISTORY_NO IN (SELECT CASHOUTHISTORY_NO FROM REWARDHISTORY WHERE MNO = #{mno} AND CASHOUTHISTORY_NO IS NOT NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET LEAVE_DATE = SYSDATE, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE, CERTIFICATION = 'N', LEAVE_REASON = #{leaveReason} WHERE MNO = #{mno}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS='Y'

SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS='Y'
ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_DATE FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC

SELECT R.RESEARCH_NO, R.RESEARCH_NAME_PANEL AS RESEARCH_NAME, R.RESEARCH_PERIOD, R.RESEARCH_PERPOSE, R.RESEARCH_REWARD FROM RESEARCH R JOIN (SELECT RESEARCH_NO, RESEARCH_STATE_NO, RESEARCH_CHANGEDATE FROM RSTATUSHISTORY JOIN (SELECT RESEARCH_NO AS RNO, MAX(RESEARCH_CHANGEDATE) AS CDATE FROM RSTATUSHISTORY GROUP BY RESEARCH_NO) ON (RNO = RESEARCH_NO) WHERE RESEARCH_CHANGEDATE = CDATE AND RESEARCH_STATE_NO = 6) RR ON (RR.RESEARCH_NO = R.RESEARCH_NO) WHERE R.RESEARCH_NO NOT IN (1, 2) AND RR.RESEARCH_STATE_NO = 6 ORDER BY R.RESEARCH_NO DESC
SELECT RESEARCH_NO, RESEARCH_NAME, RESEARCH_PERIOD, RESEARCH_PERPOSE, RESEARCH_REWARD FROM RESEARCH WHERE RESEARCH_NO = 1
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO CASHOUTHISTORY VALUES(SEQ_CASHOUTHISTORY.NEXTVAL,#{cashoutNo},#{mno},SYSDATE,NULL)
SELECT SEQ_CASHOUTHISTORY.CURRVAL FROM DUAL

SELECT REWARD_POINT-(SELECT CASHOUT_AMOUNT FROM CASHOUT WHERE CASHOUT_NO =#{cashoutNo}) FROM PANELREWARD WHERE MNO=#{mno}
INSERT INTO REWARDHISTORY VALUES(SEQ_REWARDHISTORY.NEXTVAL, #{afterChangePoint},'캐시 아웃',#{changeAmount},#{mno},SYSDATE, #{cashoutHistoryNo},NULL,NULL,NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE PANELREWARD SET REWARD_POINT = #{afterChangePoint} WHERE MNO =#{mno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRYHISTORY VALUES(SEQ_INQUIRY.NEXTVAL, #{inquiryTitle}, #{inquiryContext}, NULL, #{mno},#{inquiryCategoryNo},SYSDATE,NULL)
mapper.select:
SELECT INQUIRY_NO, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTEXT, INQUIRY_ANSWER, MNO, INQUIRYCATEGORY_NO, INQUIRY_DATE, INQUIRY_ANSWERDATE FROM INQUIRYHISTORY WHERE MNO = #{mno}
ORDER BY INQUIRY_DATE DESC

SELECT INQUIRY_NO, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTEXT, INQUIRY_ANSWER, MNO, INQUIRYCATEGORY_NO, INQUIRY_DATE, INQUIRY_ANSWERDATE FROM INQUIRYHISTORY
ORDER BY INQUIRY_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INQUIRYHISTORY WHERE MNO = #{mno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INQUIRYHISTORY
mapper.update: UPDATE INQUIRYHISTORY SET INQUIRY_ANSWER =#{inquiryAnswer},INQUIRY_ANSWERDATE = SYSDATE WHERE INQUIRY_NO =#{inquiryNo}
UPDATE INQUIRYHISTORY SET INQUIRY_ANSWER = NULL,INQUIRY_ANSWERDATE = NULL WHERE INQUIRY_NO =#{inquiryNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ VALUES(SEQ_FAQ.NEXTVAL,#{faqTitle},#{faqContext},'Y',#{faqCategoryNo})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_STATUS='Y'
SELECT * FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE FAQ SET FAQ_STATUS ='N' WHERE FAQ_NO = ${faqNo}
UPDATE FAQ SET FAQ_TITLE = #{faqTitle}, FAQ_CONTEXT = #{faqContext}, FAQCATEGORY_NO = #{faqCategoryNo} WHERE FAQ_NO = #{faqNo}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RESEARCHQUESTION WHERE RESEARCH_NO = 1
SELECT * FROM RESEARCHCHOICE WHERE RQUESTION_NO = #{ rquestionNo } ORDER BY RCHOICE_ORDER ASC

SELECT COUNT (*) FROM RESEARCH R JOIN RESEARCHTARGET RT USING (RESEARCH_NO) JOIN (SELECT RESEARCH_NO, RESEARCH_STATE_NO, RESEARCH_CHANGEDATE FROM RSTATUSHISTORY JOIN (SELECT RESEARCH_NO AS RNO, MAX(RESEARCH_CHANGEDATE) AS CDATE FROM RSTATUSHISTORY GROUP BY RESEARCH_NO) ON (RNO = RESEARCH_NO) WHERE RESEARCH_CHANGEDATE = CDATE AND RESEARCH_STATE_NO = 6) USING (RESEARCH_NO) JOIN (SELECT RESEARCH_NO, LISTAGG(RQUESTION_VIDEOLINK || '') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY RQUESTION_VIDEOLINK) RQUESTION_VIDEOLINK FROM RESEARCHQUESTION GROUP BY RESEARCH_NO) USING (RESEARCH_NO) WHERE RESEARCH_NO NOT IN (SELECT RESEARCH_NO FROM ATTEMPTPARTICIPANT WHERE MNO = #{ mno }) AND RESEARCH_NO <> 1 AND RESEARCH_NO <> 2 AND ((TARGET_GENDER = 'A' OR TARGET_GENDER = (SELECT P.PANEL_GENDER FROM MEMBER M JOIN PANEL P USING (MNO) WHERE MNO = #{ mno })) AND (TARGET_AGERANGE = 'all' OR ( SUBSTR(TARGET_AGERANGE, 1, 2) <= (SELECT (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - SUBSTR(P.PANEL_BIRTHDAY, 1, 4) +1) FROM MEMBER M JOIN PANEL P USING (MNO) WHERE MNO = #{ mno }) AND SUBSTR(TARGET_AGERANGE, 4, 2) >= (SELECT (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - SUBSTR(P.PANEL_BIRTHDAY, 1, 4) +1) FROM MEMBER M JOIN PANEL P USING (MNO) WHERE MNO = #{ mno }))) AND (TARGET_LOCATION = 'all' OR ( TARGET_LOCATION = (SELECT DECODE(RH.RQUESTION_RESPONSE, 1, 'metropolitan', 2, 'metropolitan', 8, 'metropolitan', '') FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN RESEARCHHISTORY RH USING (MNO) WHERE MNO = #{ mno } AND RH.RESEARCH_NO = 1 AND RH.RQUESTION_NO = 73) OR TARGET_LOCATION = (SELECT DECODE(RH.RQUESTION_RESPONSE, 1, 'city', 2, 'city', 3, 'city', 4, 'city', 5, 'city', 6, 'city', 7, 'city', '') FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN RESEARCHHISTORY RH USING (MNO) WHERE MNO = #{ mno } AND RH.RESEARCH_NO = 1 AND RH.RQUESTION_NO = 73))))
ORDER BY RESEARCH_NO ASC

SELECT RESEARCH_NO, RESEARCH_NAME_PANEL AS RESEARCH_NAME, RESEARCH_PERIOD, RESEARCH_PERPOSE, RESEARCH_REWARD, RQUESTION_VIDEOLINK FROM RESEARCH R JOIN RESEARCHTARGET RT USING (RESEARCH_NO) JOIN (SELECT RESEARCH_NO, RESEARCH_STATE_NO, RESEARCH_CHANGEDATE FROM RSTATUSHISTORY JOIN (SELECT RESEARCH_NO AS RNO, MAX(RESEARCH_CHANGEDATE) AS CDATE FROM RSTATUSHISTORY GROUP BY RESEARCH_NO) ON (RNO = RESEARCH_NO) WHERE RESEARCH_CHANGEDATE = CDATE AND RESEARCH_STATE_NO = 6) USING (RESEARCH_NO) JOIN (SELECT RESEARCH_NO, LISTAGG(RQUESTION_VIDEOLINK || '') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY RQUESTION_VIDEOLINK) RQUESTION_VIDEOLINK FROM RESEARCHQUESTION GROUP BY RESEARCH_NO) USING (RESEARCH_NO) WHERE RESEARCH_NO NOT IN (SELECT RESEARCH_NO FROM ATTEMPTPARTICIPANT WHERE MNO = #{ mno }) AND RESEARCH_NO <> 1 AND RESEARCH_NO <> 2 AND ((TARGET_GENDER = 'A' OR TARGET_GENDER = (SELECT P.PANEL_GENDER FROM MEMBER M JOIN PANEL P USING (MNO) WHERE MNO = #{ mno })) AND (TARGET_AGERANGE = 'all' OR ( SUBSTR(TARGET_AGERANGE, 1, 2) <= (SELECT (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - SUBSTR(P.PANEL_BIRTHDAY, 1, 4) +1) FROM MEMBER M JOIN PANEL P USING (MNO) WHERE MNO = #{ mno }) AND SUBSTR(TARGET_AGERANGE, 4, 2) >= (SELECT (EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) - SUBSTR(P.PANEL_BIRTHDAY, 1, 4) +1) FROM MEMBER M JOIN PANEL P USING (MNO) WHERE MNO = #{ mno }))) AND (TARGET_LOCATION = 'all' OR ( TARGET_LOCATION = (SELECT DECODE(RH.RQUESTION_RESPONSE, 1, 'metropolitan', 2, 'metropolitan', 8, 'metropolitan', '') FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN RESEARCHHISTORY RH USING (MNO) WHERE MNO = #{ mno } AND RH.RESEARCH_NO = 1 AND RH.RQUESTION_NO = 73) OR TARGET_LOCATION = (SELECT DECODE(RH.RQUESTION_RESPONSE, 1, 'city', 2, 'city', 3, 'city', 4, 'city', 5, 'city', 6, 'city', 7, 'city', '') FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN RESEARCHHISTORY RH USING (MNO) WHERE MNO = #{ mno } AND RH.RESEARCH_NO = 1 AND RH.RQUESTION_NO = 73))))
ORDER BY RESEARCH_NO ASC
SELECT * FROM RESEARCHQUESTION RQ LEFT JOIN UPLOADFILE USING (RQUESTION_NO) WHERE RQ.RESEARCH_NO = #{ researchNo } ORDER BY RESEARCH_ORDER ASC
SELECT * FROM RESEARCHCHOICE RC LEFT JOIN UPLOADFILE USING (RCHOICE_NO) WHERE RC.RQUESTION_NO = #{ rquestionNo } ORDER BY RCHOICE_ORDER ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL,#{noticeTitle},#{noticeContext},SYSDATE,0,1,'Y')
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_STATUS='N' WHERE NOTICE_NO=#{noticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTEMPTPARTICIPANT VALUES(SEQ_ATTEMPTPARTICIPANT.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{ mno }, #{ researchNo })
mapper.update: UPDATE PANELREWARD SET REWARD_POINT = (SELECT REWARD_POINT FROM PANELREWARD WHERE MNO = (SELECT MNO FROM PANEL P WHERE P.REFER_PANELCODE = #{nominee})) + 100 WHERE MNO = (SELECT MNO FROM PANEL P WHERE P.REFER_PANELCODE = #{nominee})
UPDATE PANELREWARD SET REWARD_POINT = (SELECT REWARD_POINT FROM PANELREWARD WHERE MNO = #{mno}) + 500 WHERE MNO = #{mno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REWARDHISTORY VALUES (SEQ_REWARDHISTORY.NEXTVAL, (SELECT REWARD_POINT FROM PANELREWARD WHERE MNO = (SELECT MNO FROM PANEL P WHERE P.REFER_PANELCODE = #{nominee})), '피추천인', '+100', (SELECT MNO FROM PANEL P WHERE P.REFER_PANELCODE = #{nominee}), SYSDATE, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL)
INSERT INTO REWARDHISTORY VALUES (SEQ_REWARDHISTORY.NEXTVAL, (SELECT REWARD_POINT FROM PANELREWARD WHERE MNO = #{mno}), '추천인', '+500', #{mno}, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL)
INSERT INTO REWARDHISTORY VALUES(SEQ_REWARDHISTORY.NEXTVAL, #{ afterchangePoint }, '설문조사참여', '+'||#{ surveyReward }, #{ mno }, SYSDATE, NULL, NULL, NULL, #{ researchNo })
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM RESEARCHQUESTION RQ LEFT JOIN UPLOADFILE UF ON (RQ.RESEARCH_NO = UF.RESEARCH_NO) WHERE UF.RESEARCH_NO = 2 ORDER BY RESEARCH_ORDER ASC
SELECT * FROM RESEARCHCHOICE WHERE RQUESTION_NO = #{ rquestionNo } ORDER BY RCHOICE_ORDER ASC
SELECT * FROM DISCRIMINATIONQUESTION WHERE RESEARCH_NO = #{ researchNo } ORDER BY DISCRIMINATION_QUESTIONORDER ASC
SELECT * FROM DISCRIMINATIONCHOICE WHERE DISCRIMINATION_QUESTIONNO = #{ rquestionNo } ORDER BY DISCRIMINATION_CHOICEORDER ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESEARCHHISTORY VALUES(SEQ_RESEARCHHISTORY.NEXTVAL, #{ researchNo }, #{ mno }, NULL, #{ researchTime }, #{ rquestionNo }, SYSDATE, #{ rquestionResponse })
INSERT INTO DISPOSALHISTORY VALUES(SEQ_DISPOSALHISTORY.NEXTVAL, #{ researchhistoryNo }, #{ disposalReason })
INSERT INTO NONDISPOSALHISTORY VALUES(SEQ_NONDISPOSALHISTORY.NEXTVAL, #{ researchhistoryNo })
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NONDISPOSALHISTORY JOIN RESEARCHHISTORY USING (RESEARCHHISTORY_NO) WHERE RESEARCH_NO = #{ researchNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RSTATUSHISTORY VALUES(SEQ_RSTATUSHISTORY.NEXTVAL, #{ researchNo }, 7, SYSDATE, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE PANELTERNARY SET TERNARY_COUNT = #{ ternaryCount } WHERE MNO = #{ mno }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TERNARYOUTHISTORY VALUES(SEQ_TERNARYOUTHISTORY.NEXTVAL, #{ ternaryCount }, #{ ternaryReason }, #{ mno } )
mapper.update: UPDATE PANEL SET PANELLEVEL_NO = 6 WHERE MNO = #{ mno }
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO PANELSURVEY VALUES (SEQ_PANELSURVEY.NEXTVAL, #{surveyTitle}, SYSDATE, #{mno}, #{scategoryNo}, #{surveyContext}, 'Y', 0)
SELECT SEQ_PANELSURVEY.CURRVAL FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO SURVEYCHOICE VALUES (SEQ_PANELSURVEYCHOICE.NEXTVAL, #{schoiceContext}, #{surveyNo}, #{schoiceOrder})
SELECT SEQ_PANELSURVEYCHOICE.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO UPLOADFILE VALUES (SEQ_UPLOADFILE.NEXTVAL, '패널서베이 보기', #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, SYSDATE, 'Y', NULL, #{schoiceNo}, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PANELSURVEY PS JOIN SURVEYCHOICE SC ON (PS.SURVEY_NO = SC.SURVEY_NO) LEFT JOIN UPLOADFILE UF ON (UF.SCHOICE_NO = SC.SCHOICE_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MNO = PS.MNO) JOIN SURVEYCATEGORY C ON (C.SCATEGORY_NO = PS.SCATEGORY_NO) WHERE PANELSURVEY_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SURVEYREPLY WHERE SURVEY_NO = PS.SURVEY_NO) REPLY_COUNT, SURVEY_LIKE, PS.SURVEY_NO, PS.SURVEY_TITLE, TO_CHAR(PS.SURVEY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') SURVEY_DATE, M.USER_NAME, C.SCATEGORY_NAME, PS.SURVEY_CONTEXT, SC.SCHOICE_NO, SC.SURVEY_NO, SC.SCHOICE_CONTEXT, SC.SCHOICE_ORDER, UF.CHANGE_NAME FROM PANELSURVEY PS JOIN SURVEYCHOICE SC ON (PS.SURVEY_NO = SC.SURVEY_NO) LEFT JOIN UPLOADFILE UF ON (UF.SCHOICE_NO = SC.SCHOICE_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MNO = PS.MNO) JOIN SURVEYCATEGORY C ON (C.SCATEGORY_NO = PS.SCATEGORY_NO) WHERE PANELSURVEY_STATUS = 'Y'
ORDER BY SC.SCHOICE_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LIKEHISTORY VALUES (SEQ_LIKEHISTORY.NEXTVAL, #{surveyNo}, #{mno})
mapper.select: SELECT SC.SCHOICE_CONTEXT, COUNT(SC.SCHOICE_CONTEXT) AS CHOICE_COUNT FROM SURVEYHISTORY SH JOIN SURVEYCHOICE SC ON (SC.SCHOICE_NO = SH.SCHOICE_NO) WHERE SH.SURVEY_NO = #{surveyNo} GROUP BY SC.SCHOICE_CONTEXT ORDER BY CHOICE_COUNT DESC

SELECT SR.SURVEYREPLY_NO, M.USER_NAME, SR.SURVEYREPLY_CONTEXT, TO_CHAR(SR.SURVEYREPLY_DATE + 9 / (24) + 71 / (24 * 60 * 60), 'YYYY-MM-DD "at" HH:MI AM') AS SURVEYREPLY_DATE, SR.SURVEYREPLY_REFRID FROM SURVEYREPLY SR JOIN PANELSURVEY PS ON (PS.SURVEY_NO = SR.SURVEY_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MNO = SR.MNO) WHERE SR.SURVEY_NO = #{surveyNo} ORDER BY SR.SURVEYREPLY_DATE ASC
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SURVEYHISTORY VALUES (SEQ_SURVEYHISTORY.NEXTVAL, #{choiceNo}, #{surveyNo}, #{mno}, SYSDATE)
SELECT SEQ_SURVEYHISTORY.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE PANELREWARD SET REWARD_POINT = (SELECT REWARD_POINT FROM PANELREWARD WHERE MNO = #{mno}) WHERE MNO = #{mno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REWARDHISTORY VALUES (SEQ_REWARDHISTORY.NEXTVAL, ((SELECT REWARD_POINT FROM PANELREWARD WHERE MNO = #{mno}) + 1), '패널 서베이', '+1', #{mno}, SYSDATE, NULL, #{surveyHistoryNo}, NULL, NULL)

INSERT INTO SURVEYREPLY VALUES (SEQ_SURVEYREPLY.NEXTVAL, #{surveyReplyContext}, SYSDATE, NULL, #{surveyNo}, #{mno})
SELECT SEQ_SURVEYREPLY.CURRVAL FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO SURVEYREPLY VALUES (SEQ_SURVEYREPLY.NEXTVAL, #{surveyReplyContext}, SYSDATE, #{surveyReplyRefRid}, #{surveyNo}, #{mno})
SELECT SEQ_SURVEYREPLY.CURRVAL FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER JOIN PANEL USING (MNO) WHERE MNO = #{ mno }
SELECT NVL(COUNT(DISTINCT RH.RESEARCH_NO), 0) FROM RESEARCHHISTORY RH LEFT JOIN RESEARCH R ON (RH.RESEARCH_NO = R.RESEARCH_NO)WHERE RH.MNO = #{mno}

SELECT RH.RESEARCH_NO, MAX(RH.RESEARCH_RESPONSE_DATE) AS RESEARCH_RESPONSE_DATE,R.RESEARCH_NAME FROM RESEARCHHISTORY RH LEFT JOIN RESEARCH R ON (RH.RESEARCH_NO = R.RESEARCH_NO) WHERE RH.MNO = #{mno} GROUP BY RH.RESEARCH_NO, R.RESEARCH_NAME ORDER BY 2 DESC
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM ATTEMPTPARTICIPANT WHERE MNO =#{mno} AND RESEARCH_NO NOT IN(SELECT RESEARCH_NO FROM RESEARCHHISTORY WHERE MNO=#{mno})

SELECT AT.RESEARCH_NO, R.RESEARCH_NAME, AT.ATTEMPT_DATE FROM ATTEMPTPARTICIPANT AT LEFT JOIN RESEARCH R ON (AT.RESEARCH_NO = R.RESEARCH_NO)WHERE AT.MNO =#{mno} AND AT.RESEARCH_NO NOT IN(SELECT RESEARCH_NO FROM RESEARCHHISTORY WHERE MNO=#{mno})ORDER BY 3 DESC
